all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Go your way whithersoever I will, and it shall be given you by the Comforter what you shall do and whither you shall go.
Doctrine and Covenants 31:11
Quote of the Day
"The power of the Lord’s Spirit enlightens the faithful today, illuminating the reality of eternal life."
Neil L. Andersen | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
